1112:7: kalyāṇamitre śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādya evam adhyeṣitavyam- yathā pūrvatathāgatārhat-samyaksambuddhaiḥ mahābhūmisthitabodhisattvaiśca pūrvam anuttarasamyaksambodhau cittotpādaḥ kṛtaḥ tathā evaṃ nāmno mamāpi ācāryo'nuttarasamyaksambodhau cittam utpādayed iti triḥ vadet|
1112:9: ahamevaṃnāmā etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ dvipadānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi|
1112:11: ahamevaṃnāmā etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ dharmāṇāmuttamaṃ śāntavirāgaṃ dharma śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi|
1112:13: ahamevaṃnāmā etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ gaṇānāmuttamaṃ āryabodhisattvāvaivartikabodhisattvasaṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi iti triḥ vadet|
1112:14: evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ śaraṇagamanaṃ kṛttvā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ,
1112:15: daśadiśāṃ sarvabuddhān bodhisattvāṃśca manasā ālambya praṇamanaṃ yathālabdhaṃ pūjādikaṃ ca kuryāt|
1112:16: ācāryam sammukhaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya utkuṭukāsano'pi vā kṛtāñjaliḥ cittam utpādayet|
1112:19: ahamevaṃnāmā- asyāṃ jātāvanyāsu vā jātiṣvanavarāgre vā dāna-śīla-bhāvanāyaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ syāt kāritaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ vā anumoditaṃ bhavet taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ yathā pūrvakaiḥ tathāgatārhatsamyaksambuddhaiḥ mahābhūmipraviṣṭaiḥ mahābodhisattvaiśca anuttarasaṃyaksambodhau cittamutpāditaṃ tathā evaṃnāmā ahamapi etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ anuttarasamyakmahāsambodhau cittam utpādayeyam|
1112:25: tathaiva ācāryābhāve'pi svayaṃ bodhicittotpādavidhiḥ- tathāgataśākyamuniṃ daśadiksarvatathāgatāṃśca manasā vicintya vandanā-pūjādividhiṃ ca kṛtvā adhyeṣaṇāsahitamācāryapadavirahitaśaraṇagamanādikramaṃ pūrvavad niṣpādayet|
1112:26: evaṃ utpannacittaḥ pudgalaḥ bodhicittavṛddhyartha antaśo divā trivāraṃ rātrau ca trivāraṃ-
1112:27: buddhaṃ ca dharmañca gaṇottamaṃ ca yāvaddhi bodhiṃ śaraṇaṃ gato'smi|
1112:28: dānādikṛtyaiśca kṛtairmayaibhiḥ buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāya||3||
1112:40: utpannacitteṣu bodhisattveṣu śāstṛsaṃjñāmutpādya daśasu dikṣu samyagguṇākhyānam,
1112:41: ye sattvāḥ kuśale sthāpitāḥ teṣām anuttarasamyaksambodhau sthāpanaṃ na tu śrāvakapratyekabuddhatveṣviti|
1112:44: tatra prathamaṃ vidhivad utpannabodhicittasya bodhisattvasya sarvabodhisattvaśīlaśikṣāṃ suśikṣitukāmanayā bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvasaṃvarasthitaṃ,
1112:45: bodhisattvasaṃvaravidhijñaṃ bodhisattvasaṃvarapradānena śiṣyānugrahasamartha kalyāṇamitraṃ namaskṛtya taccaraṇe nipatya adhyeṣaṇā- “ācārya ! tavāhaṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamākāṃkṣāmyādātuṃ tadarhasyanuparodhena muhūrtamasmākamanukampayā dātuṃ śrotuñca“ ,
1112:57: tatpaścāt tathāgataśākyamuneḥ niṣiktāṃ pratimāṃ paṭacitram vā purato'vasthāpya tathāgataśākyamunyādīn daśadiksarvalokadhātvavasthitān sarvabuddhabodhisattvān purato bhāvayet|
1112:58: yathāśakti bāhyapañcapūjayā pūjāṃ vandanaṃ ca kuryāt|
1112:59: tadanantaraṃ kalyāṇamitram uccāsanasthitaṃ śāstṛsaṃjñayā namaskṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya utkuṭukāsanena vāpi kṛtāñjaliḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ bodhisattvasaṃvaragrahaṇāya evam adhyeṣayet-
1112:60: “ācāryo bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ me śīghraṃ dadātu“ ityevaṃ trivāraṃ kalyāṇamitram adhyeṣeta|
1112:61: tataḥ kalyāṇamitra upaviṣṭa utthito vāpi saḥ bodhisattvasaṃvaragrāhakaṃ taṃ evaṃ paripṛcchet- “evaṃnāmā tvaṃ bodhisattvo'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ|
1112:62: evaṃ pṛṣṭe sati tena grāhakabodhisattvenāpi āmeti pratijñātavyam“|
1112:63: tataḥ 'akṣayāprameyānuttarapuṇyamahānidhibhūtaḥ sarvabuddhaguṇaratnākaro bodhisattvasaṃvaro'cireṇa adhigamyata' iti cintayan cittaprasādāt saharṣa tūṣṇībhūya kṛtāñjalistiṣṭhet|
1112:64: atha sa kalyāṇamitraḥ trikālasarvabodhisattvasarvaśikṣāpadāni sarvañca śīlaṃsaṃvaraśīlaṃ ,
1112:66: sattvārthakriyāśīlañca samāsataḥ śiṣyam ababodhya- “sarvabodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni tāni ca sarvabodhisattvaśīlāni kiṃ mattaḥ gṛhītukāmo'si“ evaṃ śiṣyaṃ pṛcchet|
1112:67: tasmin tathā “gṛhītukāmo'smi“ iti pratijñāte sati bodhisattvasaṃvaro dātavyaḥ|
1112:68: tvamevaṃnāmā bhadanta āyuṣmān kulaputro vā mat bodhisattva ityeva saṃjñakāt “sarvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañca|
1112:71: yāni śikṣāpadāni yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ sarvabodhisattvānāṃ bhavati|
1112:76: evam ācāryeṇa trivāraṃ “grahīṣyasi kiṃ“ iti uktvā śiṣyeṇa “ām sugṛhīṣyāmi“ iti trivāraṃ abhihite saṃvaraṃ samādadyāt|
1112:77: tataḥ sa kalyāṇamitraḥ śiṣyāya bodhisattvasaṃvaraṃ sattvā daśadiksarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ pañcāṅganamaskārapūrva kṛtāñjaliḥ evaṃ trivāraṃ vadet- “pratīgṛhītamanena evaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena mama evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikād yāvat trirapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam|
1112:78: so'hamevaṃnāmātmānaṃ sākṣibhūtamasyaitannāmno bodhisattvasya paramāryāṇāṃ viparokṣāṇāmapi sarvatra sarvasattvāviparokṣabuddhīnāṃ daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvārocayāmyasmin bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam“|
1112:81: tata utthāya kalyāṇamitraḥ bodhisattvasaṃvaragrāhakaṃ bodhisattvam evaṃ brūyāt-“evaṃnāma bodhisattva! tvaṃ śṛṇu- iyaṃ hi dharmatā|
1112:82: yadā bodhisattvena bodhisattvasaṃvarasamādānakarmavācanā parisampādyate tadā daśadiksarvabuddhakṣetreṣu buddhabodhisattveṣu etādṛṅnimittāni prādurbhavanti|
1112:83: te buddhabodhisattvā evaṃ kasmiṃścid buddhakṣetre evaṃnāmā bodhisattva evaṃnāmno bodhisattvād bodhisattvasaṃvarasamādānaṃ gṛhṇāti iti saṃjānanti“|
1112:84: ataḥ te bhagavanto buddhā te ca bodhisattvā dharmasnehāt putrān bhrātṛkāniva sandadhate|
1112:86: atha tena kalyāṇamitreṇa sa bodhisattva evaṃ vaktvyaḥ|
1112:90: yato'śraddhebhyo bodhisattvasaṃvarapradarśane aśraddadhānā sattvāste bodhisattvasaṃvaraṃ aśraddhayā parityajanti|
1112:91: ato yāvad bodhisattvo bodhisattvasaṃvarasthitaḥ puṇyarāśiyukto bhavati tāvad aśraddhayā sa tenaiva apuṇyarāśinā ca yukto bhavati|
1112:92: yato bodhisattvaḥ sattvān sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parirakṣati anyāṃśca pāpebhyo nivārayati|
1112:94: atha śikṣāpadapārājikasthānabhūtān saṃvaranāśahetūn darśayitvā duṣkṛtān kliṣṭākliṣṭān api darśayet|
1112:95: kalyāṇamitraḥ samāsato'bodhisattvasaṃvaraviṃśakam' tathā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ śīlaparivarttañca bhāṣeta|
1112:97: tenaiva bhāratīyopādhyāyena mahāsaṃśodhakalokacakṣuṣā bhikṣu-kuśalamatinā (dge vai blo gros ) cānūditaḥ||
1112:98: punastenaiva paṇḍitena lokacakṣuṣā bhikṣu-jayaśīlena (chul khrims rgyal va)
